events.name: Grails48 - Bangalore
events.about: Grails48 is a global community hackathon series and startup mentorship program. Our first event newbie is taking place Nov 9-11th, 2012 online and in various locations. The purpose of Grails48 is to bring the Grails world together igniting innovation with our favorite JVM based tools and platforms.

events.name: Cloud Foundry Open Tour, Bangalore - Evening Session
events.about:
Schedule and information: http://cloudfoundryopen.com/2012/bangalore

Dont have a Cloud Foundry account yet?
Sign up now

Use code CFOpenTour2012 for instant approval.

The evening session runs from 3:00pm-8:00pm and includes the following:

  • Cloud Foundry Bootcamp with Josh Long
  • Hackathon
  • Code Lab
  • Demos of Applications, Prizes
  • Dinner & Drinks

There is also a morning session. Registration for the morning session available at http://cloudfoundryopen-bangalore-morning.eventbrite.com
